thread.title: Sheraton Macao Hotel Launches Exclusive Wedding Package to Reward Couples Like Never BeforeTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Sheraton Macao Hotel Launches Exclusive Wedding Package to Reward Couples Like Never BeforeTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Sheraton Macao Hotel Launches Exclusive Wedding Package to Reward Couples Like Never BeforeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Sheraton Macao Hotel Launches Exclusive Wedding Package to Reward Couples Like Never Before
Sheraton Macao Hotel, Cotai Central is introducing an exclusive wedding package for couples starting at just HKD/MOP $8,988* during the 32nd Wedding, Banquet,Beauty & Jewellery Expo at The Venetian Macao from 21 to 23 August 2015.Couples who book a Sheraton Macao wedding package can choose from one of five specially designed Chinese menus, upgrade to opulent suites, enjoy dinner for two at Sheraton Macao’s renowned Italian restaurant, Bene, and get delightful perks on their wedding anniversary.
This exclusive wedding package offer is valid until 31 December 2016. Guests who book during the wedding expo at The Venetian Macao will receive even more exclusive benefits, and Bank of China cardholders will be entitled to a complimentary Pre-Wedding photo package and Wedding Day photography cash voucher, valued at MOP 7,980.
“From a full-size banquet with over 700 guests in the impressive pillar-less Kashgar Grand Ballroom to a modern alfresco soiree on our beautifully landscaped lush pool deck, Sheraton Macao Hotel’s diverse facilities give our guests flexibility and allow them to free their imaginations to create a truly memorable wedding experience,” said Daniella Tonetto, General Manager of Sales and Marketing, Sheraton Macao Hotel, Cotai Central and The St. Regis Macao, Cotai Central.
“With Macau just three to five hours away from most major Asian cities, we are seeing increasing interest especially from Southeast Asian guests who wish to make their big day a destination wedding to remember. Our property is strategically located in the heart of the Cotai Strip so it’s also a great opportunity for guests to extend their stay to experience all the exciting things Macau has to offer. We look forward to leading the way in transforming Macau into a premier wedding destination in Asia.”
Source:- Sheraton Macao Hotel
